userName.regexNotice:
Username can only contain letters or numbers and no spaces.
Example: user123, Peaches,...

password.regexNotice:
Passwords can only contain letters or numbers and no spaces.
Example: helloWorld, Peaches,...

fullName.regexNotice:
Full name is only allowed to contain letters or numbers, you can put Vietnamese names.
Example: Vũ Trung Tín, Peaches,...

gmail.regexNotice:
Gmail is only allowed to contain letters, numbers or . characters and no spaces.
Example: tinvt_7680@gmail.com,...
